name: Hard Little Known Facts About Everything Quiz / Test  | 10 Questions

questions.text: King Henry III of France regularly ate poultry soaked in what?
questions.explanation:
perfume.

	He also ate partridges coated in solid gold and omelets sprinkled in ground-up pearls.

questions.text: Pogonophobia is the scientific term for a fear of ________?
questions.explanation:
beards.

	The fear of nosebleeds is epistaxiophobia, the fear of urine is urophobia and the fear of crossing streets is dromophobia.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT true?
questions.correct: the highest number of glass cups balanced on a chin was 101
options: a man had two pupils in each eye
In ancient Rome a bad haircut was thought to cause storms
a man can suck milk up his nose and squirt it out of his eye
questions.explanation:
the highest number of glass cups balanced on a chin was 101.

	A man named Liu Ch'ung of Shansi, China was born with two pupils in each eye in the 10th Century and never had any problems with it. Jim Chicon has the ability to suck milk up his nose and squirt it out of his eye because his tear ducts work two ways, while most people's ducts only work one way. He can shoot the milk up to a distance of 8 feet. In Ancient Rome, people said if a man has a bad haircut, it will upset the gods and spirits causing a storm. The most glass cups ever balanced on a chin was 62, by Ashrita Furman.

questions.text: What is the longest word you can type on a keyboard using your left hand?
questions.explanation:
stewardesses.

	The longest word you can type using the top row of keys is 'typewriter'.

questions.text: The cigarette lighter was invented before the match. True or False?

questions.explanation:
both.

	Lunar rainbows have weaker colors than those created by the sun.

questions.text: Which swan has 25,000 feathers, more than any other bird?
questions.explanation:
whistling.

	The hummingbird has the least amount of feathers, 900.

questions.text: The word 'ozone' comes from the Greek word meaning what?
questions.explanation:
smell.

	This form of oxygen has a strong seaweed smell.

questions.text: Of all the animal species on earth, how many legs do most of them have?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The majority of the 750,000 known animal species are insects.

questions.text: A cobra is fascinated by a snake charmer's ________?
questions.explanation:
movements.

	Cobra snakes are deaf, except for the King Cobra.
